bcl:section.bcl:text: The Regional District of Okanagan-Similkameen is granted the additional power to establish and operate a 9-1-1 emergency telephone system as an extended service.

The Regional District of Okanagan-Similkameen is granted the power to operate an electrical power service as a local service with all member municipalities participating as authorized under section 1 (5) of the Municipalities Enabling and Validating Amendment Act (No. 2), 19881.
The Regional District of Okanagan-Similkameen is granted the additional power to provide an economic development grant-in-aid as an extended service.
The Regional District of Okanagan-Similkameen is granted the additional power to provide Drainage Contribution as a local service.
The Regional District of Okanagan-Similkameen is granted the additional power to provide, as a local service, electric power to Anarchist Mountain.
The Regional District of Okanagan-Similkameen is granted the additional power to provide Transit Systems as a local service.
The Regional District of Okanagan-Similkameen is granted the additional power to provide Emergency Programs as an extended service under the Emergency Program Act.

bcl:footnote.bcl:text: R.S.B.C. 1960-261-273 (5) as enacted by 1988-50-1, is intended.
